- Option C (know what time) seems irrelevant to the concept of self-assurance.
- Option D (feel important) can be related but it is more about perception from others rather than an inherent trait of self-assurance.
- Option E (trust himself) directly aligns with the idea of self-assurance, indicating confidence in one's own judgment and actions.
